results.title: [Effects of the prolonged inhibition of the angiotensin-converting enzyme on the morphological and functional characteristics of left ventricular hypertrophy in rats with persistent pressure overload].
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To assess the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (L) on mortality (M) rate and @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@congestive heart failure@@@ (@DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@CHF@@@), and the characteristics of geometrical @DISEASE_Atrial_Remodeling @DISEASE_MESH:D064752 @@@myocardial remodeling@@@ and left ventricular function in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Stenosis_Supravalvular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D021921 @@@supravalvular aortic stenosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Stenosis_Supravalvular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D021921 @@@SAS@@@).
